name: lattice-aws-cdk
description: Contract-First AWS Infrastructure with CDK - AI generates simple JSON intents, Lattice handles complex AWS implementation

scripts.cross-account:setup: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --context crossAccount=false
scripts.cross-account:bootstrap: npm run cross-account:bootstrap:dev && npm run cross-account:bootstrap:staging && npm run cross-account:bootstrap:prod
scripts.cross-account:bootstrap:dev: cdk bootstrap aws://$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query Account --output text)/us-east-1 --trust $TOOLING_ACCOUNT_ID --qualifier lattice
scripts.cross-account:bootstrap:staging: cdk bootstrap aws://$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query Account --output text)/us-east-1 --trust $TOOLING_ACCOUNT_ID --qualifier lattice
scripts.cross-account:bootstrap:prod: cdk bootstrap aws://$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query Account --output text)/us-east-1 --trust $TOOLING_ACCOUNT_ID --qualifier lattice
scripts.cross-account:deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --context environment=dev --context crossAccount=true --context targetAccountId=$DEV_ACCOUNT_ID
scripts.cross-account:deploy:staging: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --context environment=staging --context crossAccount=true --context targetAccountId=$STAGING_ACCOUNT_ID
scripts.cross-account:deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --all --context environment=prod --context crossAccount=true --context targetAccountId=$PROD_ACCOUNT_ID
scripts.cross-account:validate: npm run build && npm run test -- tests/cross-account.test.ts
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run build && npm run test && npm run synth && npm run pipeline:analyze-threats
